Title: Sakizuke
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Jeff Vlaming, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: The BAU team narrows in on the origin of the discarded bodies from the soupy crime scene, working to discover the killer's artful plan, while Will Graham begins an artful plan of his own from within the asylum.
